<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.PopulateManualServiceAjax</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>true</client_callable> <description>AJAX for PopulateManualService Script Include</description> <name>PopulateManualServiceAjax</name> <script><![CDATA[var PopulateManualServiceAjax = Class.create(); PopulateManualServiceAjax.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, { /** * This AJAX returns NULL on success. * On error, a JSON will be returned {error_source: String, error_msg: String}. * Use answer.evalJSON() on the receiving side, if answer is NOT NULL. */ process: function() { var service_id = String(this.getParameter('sysparm_service_id')); var levels = String(this.getParameter('sysparm_levels')); var isDynamic = String(this.getParameter('sysparm_is_dynamic'));
var pms = new PopulateManualService(); return pms.process(service_id, levels, isDynamic); },
type: 'PopulateManualServiceAjax' });]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-11-23 12:19:58</sys_created_on> <sys_id>90c87d229fa603000f51b7bda42e701d</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>67</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>PopulateManualServiceAjax</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Application Service" source="com.snc.cmdb.it_service">72b4cdcf6da620100acb70b353433039</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_90c87d229fa603000f51b7bda42e701d</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2019-09-05 20:02:07</sys_updated_on> <u_script_length>693</u_script_length> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
